attributes.additional_details: Stop discrimination against pitbulls by the way they look and the reputation of a pitbull which has been claimed by the owner. Pitbulls are being destroyed because of the way they look and the reputation a pitbull as become to be known and not the history of the dogs behaviour. We would like a license to be put in order to own a dog such as a pitbull and a check up every 6 months on both owner and dog.
